entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:16 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
